titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Congress disapproves of government officials who violate the public health restrictions they impose on others.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Congress disapproves of government officials who violate the public health restrictions they impose on others.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns hypocrisy and elitism and calls on all officials to impose no restriction on citizens that they themselves are not willing to abide by.
